Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric is light-brown in section and contains a number of small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and very faint traces of at least one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393488) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393488)
